DOC.brief_summary: Evaluate visual outcome contrast sensitivity subject undergoing bilateral myopic LASIK procedure use 200 kHz WaveLight® FS200 Femtosecond Laser WaveLight® Allegretto Wave® Eye-Q Laser . The use advance technology may decrease loss contrast sensitivity improvement postoperative visual acuity result .
DOC.brief_title: Visual Outcomes Contrast Sensitivity After Myopic LASIK
DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA Male female good general health , 18 year age old time preoperative examination Patient must able read , comprehend willing give HIPPA inform consent Patient planning undergo bilateral LASIK procedure Both eye must manifest refractive error 1.00 D 7.00 spherical equivalent less equal 3.00D refractive astigmatism express spectacle minus cylinder form Both eye must BSCVA 20/20 good Both eye must demonstrate refractive stability confirm clinical record , previous glass , investigator 's discretion . Patient must willing comply study dose complete entire course study . EXCLUSION CRITERIA A patient evidence keratoconus , corneal irregularity , abnormal videokeratography either eye A patient seek monovision A patient know hypersensitivity component procedural postLASIK medication A patient require use ocular drop ( ) and/or medication ( ) either eye study period exception ocular drop and/or medication provide investigator A patient surgical procedure within week precede schedule LASIK surgery A patient UNCONTROLLED systemic disease ( i.e. , potential patient therapy systemic disease yet stabilize ) A patient history prior intraocular corneal surgery ( include cataract extraction ) , active clinically significant ophthalmic disease abnormality ( include , limited , blepharitis , recurrent corneal erosion , dry eye syndrome , neovascularization > 1mm limbus ) , clinically significant lens opacity , clinical evidence trauma ( include scar ) inside visual axis , evidence glaucoma propensity narrow angle glaucoma either eye A patient significant history current evidence medical , psychological disorder , investigator 's opinion , may increase risk associate study participation may interfere interpretation study result A patient history follow medical condition , condition could affect wound healing : uncontrolled diabetes , collagen vascular disease , autoimmune disease , immunodeficiency disease , ocular herpes zoster simplex , endocrine disorder ( include , limited unstable thyroid disorder diabetes ) , lupus , rheumatoid arthritis Current participation participation within 30 day prior start study drug investigational research study .
